caption.center: BRANDY LYNN SHORT a/k/a BRANDY HALL, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA,

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Escambia County. Kim A. Skievaski, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Nancy A. Daniels, Public Defender, and Edgar Lee Elzie, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, Tallahassee, for Appellant.
Charlie Crist, Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BOOTH, DAVIS and PADOVANO, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF, IF FILED.
